roleset.name: make smaller
roleset.note: DIMINISH-V NOTES: Expect also arg2-EXT and arg2-MNR. (from diminish.01-v)
DIMINISHED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharpe data. Comparison to diminish.01. Diminish.01 is a member of VN classes other_cos-45.4 andcalibratable_cos-45.6-1. Framed by Katie (from diminished.01-j)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The board added that McCaw would be able to control LIN's operations and could, ``therefore, operate LIN in a manner which *trace* could diminish its private market value and attractiveness to a third-party purchaser in five years.''
example.arg: its private market value and attractiveness to a third-party purchaser

example.name: ergative
example.text: In following several other oil and gas partnerships that have made the conversion to a corporation in the last year, NRM also noted that tax advantages for partnerships have diminished under new tax laws.

example.name: poor John
example.text: [John's role in the Christmas play]-1 was diminished *trace*-1 from that of a wise man to that of a camel.
example.arg: from that of a wise man

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: The flow within the graft is diminished with peak systolic velocity measuring between .19 to .32 m/2.
example.arg: with peak systolic velocity measuring between .19 to .32 m/s.

example.name: Use arg 0 here
example.text: Parkinson's disease tremor is diminished with relaxtion guided imagery.
